resources.string: Please select the time range to Cut/Trim video.
Select video range from above bar to convert to GIF.\n\n Select GIF quality from below bar.
Please select the time range to extract images from video.

Each video with 20 sec duration will take upto 10 min to merge into 40 sec video, so prefer to merge small videos, otherwise it will take long time.\n Videos with high resolution will take more time so prefer to compress videos before merging.
The processing will take a long time.Please be patient.

Trim videos
Compress vieos
Extract audio(Mp3) from videos
Extract images from videos
"Try Video Editor Tools application to Trim videos / Merge Videos / Compress videos / Video to GIF / Extract audio(MP3) from videos / Extract images from videos! etc"
Please rate application with 5 stars. Your good(5 stars) review will be a great support for us. Thanks for your support!
